A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was the straw that broke the Tauntaun's back for me. I'm not longer excited about the release of future Star Wars movies. This saddens me as I've been a life-long Star Wars fan\, and there was such hope and potential when Disney took over. When the force awakens came out\, I initially liked it. But looking back now\, it was just Fool's Gold. Star Wars is now dead to me. Of course\, I will always keep hope that one day\, the franchise will be put back into the right hands. Until then...
